entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Snow level rising to 2100 metres this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 11. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
